nodes.text: Heir to the Empire: The 20th Anniversary Edition (audiobook)

Heir to the Empire: The 20th Anniversary Edition is the unabridged audio version of the Legends novel Heir to the Empire, released along with the Heir to the Empire: The 20th Anniversary Edition reissue, by author Timothy Zahn. The audiobook was performed by Marc Thompson and was released by Random House Audio as a digital download on September 6, 2011.
